roleset.name: provide a pattern for

role.descr: thing a template is provided for

example.name: template-v
example.text: Nanomechanical devices and algorithmic self - assembly have also been demonstrated , and these DNA structures have been used to template the arrangement of other molecules such as gold nanoparticles and streptavidin proteins .

propbank.arg: the arrangement of other molecules such as gold nanoparticles and streptavidin proteins

roleset.note: TEMPLATE-V NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-biotexts.
